text:
(1)
Shore Drive (running from left, where automobile is seen, to extreme right, where man and automobile appear), at and adjoining the S.E. corner of Layton Ave., showing Judge's bathing beach. On the extreme right is Judge's Hotel.
July 17, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date, from a different angle. The space where automobiles are parked is on the grounds of the private beach on
Eastchester Bay.
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
